# NSHorizontalDirection.Set

**Structure**

An efficient set of horizontal directions.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen struct Set
```

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a set of horizontal directions containing only the specified direction.

## Instance Methods

- **contains(_:)**
- **insert(_:)**
- **remove(_:)**
- **update(with:)**

## Type Properties

- **all**: A set containing the all horizontal directions (left and right).
- **left**: A set containing only the left direction.
- **right**: A set containing only the right direction.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Hashable
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
